column5: Hey Gary, We are flying out of Red Lake that same morning. Email me.Pooch~WA~

Bertholet Lake Lodge is a good choice. I haven't been there (yet), but know people that go and have met and talked to the owner. Let us know how you make out.Did I mention that in 2 days 5 hours I'll be dunkin' my boat into Lake Kipawa Quebec? You guys have longer waits than I do, but when I'm back at work and all glum you guys will be sittin/ pretty on your lakes.
338 days till we leave for Lac Seul Lodge. Waaaa! This years trip is history & I am already planning next year. YEAAH!

JohnH, sounds like we will be fishing Lac Seul the same week, 7-6 thru 7-12. I come out of an outpost on Williams Lake that accesses Lac Seul via Williams Creek. Come out into Williams Bay and head out toward main lake. Be 4th year there, tremendous fishing. I enjoy our spot, very secluded, lots of wildlife, occasional bear comes calling and ususally moose in the creek. God I can smell the cedar now!
MAN, ALL YOU GUYS ARE JUST LIKE ME!
John,I'll try to post a report by the 5th when I get back. We're staying at the main lodge, have fun on Vaughn. Jigger1
44 hours till I hit the road for Lac Seul!
40 hours and 12 minutes before I head to Gull Rock!

In 10 days and approximately 1 hour we will be leaving the dock on Lac Seul for five days of fishing bliss. I don't know about the rest of you but the anticipation is almost driving me crazy ... my rods are setextra line spooledtackle box loadedcontinuous thinking of "have I missed anything"itinerary confirmed (at least a half a dozen times)check on fishing and weather conditions (daily/hourly)catching myself thinking of nothing elseBe done already, advance the calendar, I'm going nuts!
I'm with ya! Trouble is I have to wait 17 days and 1 hour! I'll look forward to a report. Where will you be fishing on Lac Seul?
I'm one day, 12 hours and.................13 minutes from leaving.
It my third annual trip to Silver Water Wheel Lodge on the South Central portion of Lac Seul.
8 days 6 hours and counting that when my trip start will be flying out of red lake the moring of 29good fishing
8 days and I'll be there also! Fishing should be good, hope the rain lets up.
I'll be leaving for Lac Seul on the 29th. First trip there. Trying to keep the excitment under control but it keeps getting harder as the day approaches.Dave
I'am going June 29 for our first trip.I started packing odds and ends so the big rush would not happen.

Jigger1,I'll be at Silver Water Wheel one week after you. I'm going insane as well. I would really appreciate a report when you get back. We are staying at the outpost on Vaughn Lake, are you? Thanks, JohnH
I have 38 days, then wife&I are flying in for 2 weeks. cant wait.Going to Berthelot Lodge in Quebec. 2 weeks was her idea! Guess im lucky.:)
